main event: Two witnesses reported seeing a very bright light in the sky over Bellwood, Illinois on March 9, 1967.
interesting points: The object appeared like a Christmas tree light blinking and was described as jumping around while the guide remained stationary., The observation lasted for approximately 3 minutes., The object was observed moving in a south-southeast direction., The witnesses provided a brief summary that indicated the object was very bright and difficult to identify., The report is part of the Project Blue Book files which collected data on unidentified flying objects.
